org.hkijena.jipipe.ui.components.search

Class ExtendedDataTableSearchTextFieldTableRowFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.RowFilter<TableModel,Integer>
      • org.hkijena.jipipe.ui.components.search.ExtendedDataTableSearchTextFieldTableRowFilter

  • public class ExtendedDataTableSearchTextFieldTableRowFilter
extends RowFilter<TableModel,Integer>
    Filters entries via a SearchTextField that can contain search keys, but also a filter expression to filter specific columns. This class correctly maps the JIPipeDataTable annotations into strings.
